content.rendered:
Client

A world class travel agency.

Objective

Partner with an IT company that could assist them with expanding their app offerings. The company’s vision was to create a user-friendly app that is fun to use, yet practical.

Solution

Our team developed the 1001 Wonders of the World app. We created an easy-to-use interface that features:

  • Interactive map
  • Search across multiple travel dimensions
  • Video tutorial and detailed descriptions of 1,001 most interesting travel destinations in the world
  • Check visa requirements for traveling to each country
  • Bookmark favorite places and share them with friends on Facebook

Result

1001 Wonders of the World earned TOP-5 application in the US App Store rating a few days after publishing! The app earned a 4+ star rating in the app stores and has been installed over 100,000 times.
